enb_long_title: Seventh Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) Eighth Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate
enb_short_title: 8th Session of the AGBM, SBSTA 7, SBI 7
section_title: SUBSIDIARY BODY FOR SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL ADVICE
sentences: On 20 October, SBSTA Chair Tibor Faragó (Hungary) urged delegations to make progress on outstanding issues as this would be the last SBSTA session before COP-3.
Delegates adopted the agenda, as contained in document FCCC/SBSTA/1997/7.
